metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14002 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: PuTTY 0.68 through 0.73 has an Observable Discrepancy leading to an information leak in the algorithm negotiation. This allows man-in-the-middle attackers to target initial connection attempts (where no host key for the server has been cached by the client).

criterions.comment: putty package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
